name: Sandbox Battlefield
description:
Come play with your childhood toys in an autobattler where you strategize team compositions and positions on the battlefield to defeat the opposing team. Choose AI options for your units or upgrade them with their activatable ability to battle against the increasingly difficult enemy team. How many rounds can you survive?

Credits

Ethan Ball - Programmer, Music & SFXs

Braedon Fencil - Production Manager & Playtest Supervisor

James Feng - Programmer & Game Balancing

Dean Jones - Programmer & Artist
